price: Saa Da no nsania no bεyε nokorε (nsania); enti obi a ne kari boɔ mu bɛyɛ du (wͻ papa yε mu wɔ) nsania no soɔ no, saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne nkonimdifoͻ no.
arabic: وَٱلۡوَزۡنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wal-waznu yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
